spaces.name: Ethos Society
spaces.description: Ethos Society is a communal workspace where dreamers share, create, evolve, focus, accomplish their dreams, and become doers. Choose from a variety of memberships and be a part of something bigger.

spaces.name: Second Home Hollywood
spaces.description: We've created LA's healthiest workspace at our two acre outdoor campus - alfresco working areas with super-fast WiFi, and garden offices where the air is completely recycled every two minutes.

spaces.name: Dots Space
spaces.description: WE WENT VIRTUAL. SO WILL YOU. dots now offers virtual mailbox services, phone answering services, and advanced phone and sms automation for crm management.

spaces.name: MESH space
spaces.description: MESH space is a family-friendly cowork, coffee, and community lounge in South Redondo Beach, created with immense love by.

comments.text: What a magnificent view!

comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: I caught a world-record-breaking trout here on my last visit.
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian
